title: Write tests before implementation
subtask_title: QA: verify tests were written before implementation
description: Ensure tests were created before corresponding code changes.

title: Reuse existing patterns (DRY)
description: Check for duplicated logic and confirm refactors reuse helpers.
acceptance_criteria: No duplicated logic for the new behavior

title: Use SQLAlchemy for all DB operations
subtask_title: QA: verify SQLAlchemy used (no Django ORM)
description: Ensure all database access uses SQLAlchemy and not Django ORM.
acceptance_criteria: No Django ORM usage in new code

title: Validate and sanitize all user input
subtask_title: QA: verify input validation and sanitization
description: Check server-side validation and html.escape usage for strings.
acceptance_criteria: Input validation present for new endpoints

title: Templates extend base.html
description: All new templates should extend base.html.

title: Use CSS variables for styling
description: No hardcoded colors; use CSS variables only.

title: Complete one task before starting another
subtask_title: QA: verify scope focused and task completed
description: No unrelated refactors or features outside the task.

title: Do not skip tests
description: Task is not complete until tests pass.

title: Do not use Django ORM
subtask_title: QA: ensure no Django ORM usage

title: Do not hardcode secrets
description: Secrets must use env vars or .env file.

title: Do not add unrequested features
description: Stay focused on assigned task only.

title: Do not use heavy CSS frameworks
subtask_title: QA: ensure no heavy CSS frameworks

title: Do not create new files unnecessarily
subtask_title: QA: ensure reuse of existing files

title: Do not reload pages for data updates
subtask_title: QA: ensure AJAX/fetch used for updates
acceptance_criteria: No full page reloads for data updates
